insert.foreach:
insert into t_account_detail
user_id,
amount,
integral,
type,
sub_type,
version,
create_time,
update_time,
is_active,
#{item.userId},
#{item.amount},
#{item.integral},
#{item.type},
#{item.subType},
#{item.version},
#{item.createTime},
#{item.updateTime},
#{item.isActive},

mapper.delete:
delete from t_account_detail where id in
#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_account_detail
user_id = #{userId},
amount = #{amount},
integral = #{integral},
type = #{type},
sub_type = #{subType},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_active = #{isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id} and version + 1 <= #{version}

update.foreach:
update t_account_detail
user_id = #{item.userId},
amount = #{item.amount},
integral = #{item.integral},
type = #{item.type},
sub_type = #{item.subType},
version = #{item.version},
create_time = #{item.createTime},
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
is_active = #{item.isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
version = version + 1,
where id = #{item.id}

mapper.sql: id as id, user_id as userId, amount as amount, integral as integral, type as type, sub_type as subType, version as version, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_active as isActive
